hook.description: Opening must include specific, surprising fact (not generic)
hook.validation: Check first 2 paragraphs for local currency value, percentage, or specific data point
hook.bad_example: Cash flow is important for SMEs
hook.good_example: [Target audience] wait an average of X days for payment, tying up [currency][amount] in working capital (use real data from research)

statistics.description: Must include at least 3 statistics with local currency values or percentages
statistics.validation: Search for local currency values (from config/project.json), percentages, or numerical data points with sources

government_programs.description: Must name at least one government program, initiative, or agency
government_programs.examples: See config/project.json regulatory.agencies for configured government programs
government_programs.validation: Check for specific program names, not generic mentions of 'government support'

industry_focus.description: Must target specific industries, not generic 'SMEs'
industry_focus.validation: Article should mention specific industry at least 3 times

actionable_steps.description: Must include concrete next steps with portals, registrations, or timelines
actionable_steps.validation: Look for: URLs, registration portals, application processes, deadlines
actionable_steps.good_example: Register at [government portal URL] by [deadline] to qualify

local_context.description: Must use local market context throughout (see config/project.json for market details)
required_elements: Local currency values (not USD or generic currency)

internal_links.description: Link to other brand content (see config/project.json for business URL)

external_links.description: Link to authoritative sources (government sites, official reports). Valid domains loaded from config/project.json.

cta.description: Soft CTA connecting article topic to brand services (see config/project.json for CTA details)
cta.placement: End of article, after actionable steps
cta.good_example: While implementing e-invoicing, cash flow gaps may still occur during transition. Invoice financing can bridge the gap while you wait for customer payments.
